items.name: Thai Golden Bag
items.description: Deep-fried wrapped rice paper stuffed with marinated soy protein, corns, carrots, garbanzo beans, peas, and onion served with plum sauce.

items.name: Fried Spring Rolls
items.description: Deep-fried wrapped rice paper rolls stuffed with mixed vegetables and bean thread noodles (clear noodles) served with plum sauce

items.name: Fresh Rolls
items.description: Tofu, mushroom, vegetables wrapped with rice paper served with tamarind and peanut sauce.

items.name: Fried Tofu
items.description: Deep-fried tofu; served with tangy plum sauce and crushed peanuts.

items.name: Thai Samosa
items.description: Deep-fried crispy rice flour paper stuffed with assorted potatoes, onions, peas, and carrots; seasoned with curry powder.

items.name: Spicy Corn Cake
items.description: Corns and green bean mixed with Thai spices; served with cucumber salad and peanuts.

items.name: Roti
items.description: Our famous Thai style pan toasted roti flat bread served with flavorful dipping sauce and a side of cucumber salad.

items.name: Soy Protein Satay
